title: Stone Age Slide
description: Prehistoric curling meets sci-fi! Slide your stone down the ice, then zap it with your growth ray to make it bigger. Closest to the center wins the round!
controls: Hold R2/SPACE to charge throw power, release to throw. Press A/Z to activate growth ray on your stone. Left stick/WASD for menu navigation.
howToPlay: Each player throws one stone per round trying to get closest to the center target. Charge your throw power and release to slide. Use your growth ray once per round to make your stone bigger and harder to beat. Win 2 out of 3 rounds to claim victory!
